hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-'As: A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: Messenger of Allah, I have property and children, and my father finishes my property. He replied; You and your property belong to your father; your children come from the pleasantest of what you earn; so enjoy from the earning of your children

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَأْكُلُ مِنْ مَالِ وَلَدِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A Man Taking From His Son's Wealth
